Name: GLIPIZIDE
contraindication: Diabetic ketoacidosis with or without coma

Name: DICYCLOMINE HYDROCHLORIDE
contraindication: Hypersensitivity to dicyclomine or any anticholinergic drugs

Name: GLYBURIDE
contraindication: Diabetic ketoacidosis with or without coma

Name: SULFADIAZINE
contraindication: Should not be used for group A beta-hemolytic strep infections

Name: Venetoclax
contraindication: Strong CYP3A inhibitors at initiation and during ramp-up phase

Name: Selexipag
contraindication: Concomitant use of strong CYP2C8 inhibitors

Name: CYCLIZINE
contraindication: Not to be used in asthma

Name: CYCLIZINE
contraindication: difficulty in breathing or difficulty in urination due to enlargement of the prostate gland
